text: Without a Trace is a 1983 American drama movie directed by Stanley R. Jaffe and based on the novel Still Missing by Beth Gutcheon. It stars Kate Nelligan, Judd Hirsch, David Dukes, Stockard Channing, Danny Corkill and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:1983 mystery movies Category:American drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies about missing people
title: Without a Trace (movie)
